data.text: Me Onyankopɔn, me Onyankopɔn, adɛn enti na woagya me?
Ao me Onyankopɔn, mesu frɛ wo awia, nanso wonnye me so,
Nanso, wɔasi wo ɔhene sɛ Ɔkronkronni;
Wo mu na yɛn agyanom de wɔn werɛ hyɛeɛ;
Wɔsu frɛɛ wo na wogyee wɔn,
Nanso meyɛ ɔsonsono, na menyɛ onipa
Obiara a ɔhunu me di me ho fɛw;
“Ɔde ne ho to Awurade so;
Wo na woyii me firii awotwaa mu baeɛ
Ɛfiri mʼawoɔ mu na wɔde me too wo soɔ;
Ntwe wo ho mfiri me ho!
Anantwinini bebree atwa me ho ahyia;
Gyata a wɔbobom na wɔtete wɔn ahaboa mu
Wɔahwie me agu sɛ nsuo,
Mʼahoɔden awe te sɛ kyɛmferɛ mu.
Nkraman atwa me ho ahyia
Mɛtumi akan me nnompe nyinaa;
Wɔkyɛ me atadeɛ mu fa,
Na wo, Ao Awurade, ntwe wo ho.
Gye me kra firi akofena ano;
Gye me nkwa firi gyata anom;
Mɛbɔ wo din akyerɛ me nuanom;
Monkamfo Awurade, mo a mosuro no no!
Ɔmmuu nʼani nguu
Me botaeɛ a mede yi wo ayɛ wɔ badwa mu no firi wo;
Ahiafoɔ bɛdidi na wɔamee;
Asase ano nyinaa
ɛfiri sɛ ahennie wɔ Awurade
Asase so adefoɔ nyinaa bɛdidi na wɔasɔre no;
Nkyirimma nyinaa bɛsom no;
Wɔbɛka ne tenenee akyerɛ
